Biography

2024 (USF): Made nine appearances on the mound after being limited with injuries in his lone season at South Florida…posted a 4.09 ERA (5 ER/11.0 IP) with 16 strikeouts…earned the save with 2.0 shutout IP and three strikeouts vs. Maine (3/13)…recorded three strikeouts in three different outings…did not allow an earned run in six of his nine appearances.

2023 (ODU): Made six appearances in an injury-shortened season...logged five punchouts over 7.2 IP.

2022 (HILLSBOROUGH CC): Made 13 appearances and one start...ranked second on the team with 52.2 IP...posted a 1-3 record with 61 strikeouts and a 5.64 ERA...was teammates with fellow USF transfer Nick Pineda.

2021 (HILLSBOROUGH CC): Made 15 appearances on the mound as a true freshman...went 1-1 with one save, 21 strikeouts and a 2.02 ERA over 13.1 IP.

PERSONAL: Son of Jessica and Steve...has one brother, Dillon...enjoys fishing in his free time...majoring in leadership studies...favorite team: Tampa Bay Buccaneers…favorite athlete: Dale Earnhardt.
